Detailed Description

This struct defines the parameters for motion correction
Parameters:
enable if apply motion correction
motionCorrectionType 0=basic, 1=... - changed from bool to short
averagingInterval time (sec) to average singles data
motionCorrectionFile absolute path to the motion correction coordinates file
verbosity level of output
